<<<<<<< HEAD
Love to the life, or, Some meditations upon loving, and washing in the blood of Christ together, with a tast of gospel-promises, as the churches stock, or, believers patrimony. By R.M. the Benjamin of his Fathers house. Mayhew, R. (Richard)
[12], 142, [2] p.
printed for B. Harris, at the Stationers Arms in Swithins Alley, London : anno 1674.
"To the reader" signed: Richard Mayhew. With a final leaf of advertisement. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

printed for B. Harris, at the Stationers Arms in Swithins Alley, London : anno 1674.
